thread.section_title: Igero Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of igero.com
thread.title: Lyn MacInnes

author: Lyn MacInnes
title: Lyn MacInnes
text: I have in the past always bought cheap sunglasses, but having tried my husband's Oakley Prism daily sunglasses I realised the price is justified because I can see much clearer through them. It means my eyes are properly protected against the sunrays and I can see better when I am driving in sunlight. Now I am so pleased when the sun shines as I can use my lovely sunglasses. They arrived fast and well packaged. I am very happy with Igero.
